name: AnimalIdol
0:
”Alexa open animal idol”
”Alexa play animal idol”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: animal idol
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill is a part of Mini Games.

Animals are lined up and ready to be catapulted into stardom. You control the destiny of which animal will make it. Your first challenge is to select the animal you think has the talent to make it. Some may say you are the salmon-cow-eel of the music industry. Your second challenge is to spend a small budget on gaining super fans for your chosen artist. Your third challenge is to choose a venue and price the tickets for your artist's first gig. You will then get your score for the game which will be the amount of money you have made plus the number of super fans you have got.

If you launch this skill, it will tell you to open Mini Games.

HUGO FM
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
